page.title: 19Education(2)
page.content: In 1984, Linskill High and Preston High amalgamated to form John Spence High School.As John Spence is a community school,lots of other people use the building,such as Meals on Wheels and people who want to run clubs like a Toddler Group and many others.If you want to book a hall or a classroom you have to ring the deputy head to reserve the room you would like but it must be after school time. Again, for a transitional period both schools are used.But after 1986 John Spence's LInskill site will be closed and the schools will use the Preston site.There will be a new building there as well as the original school. The Linskill site will then be used for community and a part of North Shields Library will be situated there. by Samantha Fleming
